title: Documentation restructure - Cloud-first revamp
description: Restructure Meilisearch documentation to be Cloud-first. Reorganize content by capability (Products), consolidate self-hosting to Resources, update all code samples to use environment variables.

title: Update internal links to new paths
description: Find and update all internal links that point to old file paths after restructure

title: Review and update home.mdx
description: Update home page links and cards to point to new product/capability structure

title: Verify all redirects work
description: Test that all 200+ redirects correctly point to new locations

title: Content audit - Getting Started tab
description: Review all pages in Getting Started for content quality, naming, structure, and organization

title: Content audit - Products tab
description: Review all pages in Products for content quality, naming, structure, and organization

title: Fix all broken internal links
description: Find and replace all old /learn/ paths to new /products/, /guides/, /resources/ paths

title: Fix missing CodeSample import in typo_tolerance_settings.mdx
description: Line 73 references CodeSamplesTypoToleranceGuide5 but import may be missing

title: Consolidate Platform tenant token pages
description: Merge 3 generate_tenant_token_*.mdx pages into one with Tabs

title: Audit Resources section
description: Review 27 pages in resources/ for quality, consistency, broken links

title: Add Firebase and Gatsby integration guides
description: Create integration guides for official Firebase extension and Gatsby plugin

title: Add missing SDK and tool getting started guides
description: Create getting started guides for Java, .NET, Swift, Dart SDKs plus Symfony, meilisearch-importer, and meilisync

title: Code sample consistency sweep
description: Ensure all code samples use env vars instead of hardcoded URLs

title: Add deployment guides for AWS, GCP, Azure
description: Create deployment guides for major cloud providers

title: Content consolidation - merge small pages
description: Merge relevancy.mdx into ranking_rules.mdx, merge concat.mdx + prefix.mdx into query_processing.mdx

title: Audit Guides section
description: Review 15 pages in guides/ for quality, consistency, broken links

title: Create demos showcase page in Resources
description: Create resources/demos.mdx with all official demos, descriptions, live links, and screenshots
